name: Stuff Ninja
description:
Hi, I'm a student developer using Unity engine. This is my first itch.io release, obviously I'm not very experienced so please leave comment and feedback!😃 I'll mainly be releasing for macOS, but windows should also come soon when it's optimised. Please support me by donating if you can! 

This is a fruit-ninja-like game, where you click-and-drag your cursor to pop .... stuff. That's not it, you have 5 or 3 lives depending on the difficulty you choose, and you lose one whenever you miss a GOOD target or pop a BAD target. The instruction is also in the in-game UI, HAVE FUN!
